name: Solar Saviors
description:
The demo of the game Solar Saviors was made for project Context 2. Our client for this project was Playing with the Trouble. In the demo you get the explore the magical labs, talk to your coworkers and experience the diverging storylines and perspectives. 

If you play the game we hope you enjoy it and it maybe makes you think about your way of communicating or biases.

Made by Team Coconut: 

Aiden Kok, Agnese Salazzari, Iza Morel, Yvar Toorop, 

Eline van Droffelaar: https://elinevandroffelaar.artstation.com/

Tammie Treffers: https://zeptammie.artstation.com/
